text: @RahulGandhi Dear @RahulGandhi will you please declare your contribution in @PMCares, as a contributor if we are not asking about fund received and spent, why you are worried about it? We are indian nationalist and we  trust our beloved @PMOIndia and @HMOIndia . #PMCARES #COVID19
